subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Excerpts from an interview this week with Larry Ellison, owner of the sailing team BMW Oracle Racing, who is involved in a legal dispute with America’s Cup holder Alinghi, and its owner, Ernesto Bertarelli.
snippet: Excerpts from an interview this week with Larry Ellison, owner of the sailing team BMW Oracle Racing, who is involved in a legal dispute with America’s Cup holder Alinghi, and its owner, Ernesto Bertarelli.
